Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Changes the amount of the exemption permitted for capital improvements to residential buildings
Summary: Changes the amount of the exemption permitted for capital improvements to residential buildings to $200,000 where a local law or resolution is adopted on or after January 1, 2026.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to changing the amount of the exemption permitted for capital improvements to residential buildings
